title: Can't bind MB3 to Mastery Emote?
body:
Hello everyone!
Thank you for taking the time to read this; the problem is fairly simple. I can't bind my MB3 to mastery emote. 
I tried on another computer, and I can; but on mine, it shows nothing when I scroll down in my keybind settings.

I run Win 7, and not 10 (I read some major updates caused some confusion with keybindings)...

What should I try to solve this!?

Thanks
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
There could be a configuration corruption.  Try resetting your config to see if that may do the trick:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Unfortunately this didn't work :( 
My MB3 is still not recognized by the game :/
Thanks for trying!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help find some options for you.  See you there!

Thank you! Will open a ticket now :)
Love the name, by the way :D
